alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 11:49AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Herkimer County through 1230 PM EDT... At 1149 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barnveld, or 11 miles north of Utica, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, nickel size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Ohio, Newport, Poland, Cold Brook, Northwood, Russia, Grant, Gray, Nobleboro, Black Creek Reservoir, Wheelertown, Farrel Corner, Woodin Corners, Martin Corners, Bull Hill, Wilmurt, Pardeeville Corners, Wilmurt Corners, Gravesville and Hurricane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
